page.title: 01Sandford and Corton Denham
page.content: The blocked lies half in Dorset and half in Somerset. The white post inn boasts a bar where customers can stand with one foot in each county. the North West has manily level dairy farming with a little arable land scattered around and the eastern end has Croton Ridge where sheep and beef cattle are kept. Houses in the villages of Croton Denham, Sandford Orcas & Rimpton are built of local buf coloured limestone. The manor House at Sandford Orcas is opened to the public by the National Trust. Sandford also has a W.I. a Youth Club and Billiards and Snooker club. There are no village schools now so the children are taken by bus to the neightbouring schools. People living in the area need cars to travel to work, visit the Drs & hospital or to go shopping. A car is not a luxury
